According to [[Zakhara]]n [[sage]]s, the planet [[Toril|Al-Toril]] had 360 days in its year plus five High Holy Days.  Each year had twelve 30-day months, which roughly matched the orbit of the planet's [[Sel√ªne (moon)|single moon]].  The five High Holy Days followed the month of Qawafil and preceded the month of Safa each year.

The months and High Holy Days of the Zakharan calendar year were broken down as follows:
; Taraq : [[Hammer (month)|Hammer]]
; Masta : [[Alturiak]]
; Magarib : [[Ches]]
; Gammam : [[Tarsakh]]
; Mihla : [[Mirtul]]
; Qawafil : [[Kythorn]]
; Ahad, Atnen, Salas, Arba, Yasad (also called Ascension Day) : High Holy Days
; Safa : [[Flamerule]]
; Dar : [[Eleasis]]
; Riyah : [[Eleint]]
; Nau : [[Marpenoth]]
; Rahat : [[Uktar]]
; Saris : [[Nightal]]
